response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. Our product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations, offers unparalleled value and benefits. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it's worth more than $1,500,000 to you. However, I understand that negotiations are key in such transactions. Therefore, I propose to sell this remarkable product to you for $1,250,000. This price not only ensures a fair exchange but also leaves room for both of us to benefit. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing the details further.", "product_price": 1250000}
